![Aerofoil](http://raw.githubusercontent.com/aerofoil/graphics/master/logos/logo-black.png) a low-camber Linux distribution === Aerofoil is an [i3](http://i3wm.org/)-based Linux distribution. Its goal is to be as minimal as is practical. ## contact ### email aerofoil@openmailbox.org aerodev@openmailbox.org ### IRC [#aerofoil](http://webchat.freenode.net/?randomnick=0&channels=%23aerofoil) on freenode.net
